function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to protect privacy and confidentiality when using big data for disease modeling and monitoring human behavior","Impact":"Undermining public confidence, leading to decreased compliance with public health advice and adverse health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implement strict data-protection measures and comply with data-protection legislation","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymous data collection, secure data storage","People":"General public","Owner":"Data governance organizations"},{"Description":"Issues with blockchain technology adoption for protecting health information and monitoring outbreak data","Impact":"Inadequate protection of sensitive health information, potential failure in outbreak data monitoring","Mitigation":"Address issues related to data security and privacy protection, improve transparency and reliability of blockchain systems","Technologies":"Blockchain encryption, secure and transparent data recording, privacy protection measures","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare and technology organizations"}]}
